DOC.brief_summary: This research plan build basis effect acupuncture serum metabolic parameter pre-menopausal obese woman economic evaluation .
DOC.detailed_description: It consist two sub research . First , clinical research ass effect acupuncture obesity serum metabolic parameter process randomize , patient-assessor blinding , sham-acupuncture control study design . 120 subject would collect divide two group ( experimental placebo , 60 subject ) . Experimental group undergo real acupuncture treatment ( manual acupuncture + electroacupuncture ) twice week , 6 week . The effect serum metabolic parameter assess 0 6 week . Second qualitative research make basis evaluation economic efficacy patient ' satisfaction acupuncture treatment obesity .
